org.apache.beam.runners.core.triggers

Class AfterProcessingTimeStateMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.runners.core.triggers.TriggerStateMachine
      • org.apache.beam.runners.core.triggers.TriggerStateMachine.OnceTriggerStateMachine
        • org.apache.beam.runners.core.triggers.AfterDelayFromFirstElementStateMachine
          • org.apache.beam.runners.core.triggers.AfterProcessingTimeStateMachine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Experimental(value=TRIGGER)
public class AfterProcessingTimeStateMachine
extends AfterDelayFromFirstElementStateMachine
    AfterProcessingTime triggers fire based on the current processing time. They operate in the real-time domain.

    The time at which to fire the timer can be adjusted via the methods in AfterDelayFromFirstElementStateMachine, such as AfterDelayFromFirstElementStateMachine.plusDelayOf(org.joda.time.Duration) or AfterDelayFromFirstElementStateMachine.alignedTo(org.joda.time.Duration, org.joda.time.Instant).

    See Also:
